item.title: 法国抨击欧盟散户投资者保护计划代价高昂
item.description: 法国呼吁欧盟撤回一项具有里程碑意义的提案，以加强对散户投资者的保护，称目前的草案将给资产管理公司带来沉重负担，并赶走客户。【原文：France is calling on the European Union to dial back a landmark proposal improving the protection for retail investors, saying the current draft would impose onerous burdens on asset managers and drive away clients.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员听取关于普京的俄罗斯所构成军事威胁的简报
item.description: 据熟悉讨论情况的人士透露，欧洲中央银行理事会在上一次利率制定会议开始时深入分析了俄罗斯在东欧的潜在军事侵略所带来的风险。【原文：The European Central Bank Governing Council was given an in-depth analysis of the risks posed by potential Russian military aggression in eastern Europe at the start of its last rate-setting meeting, according to people familiar with the discussion.】

item.title: 加拿大央行称贸易战引发 "无序 "抛售风险
item.description: 加拿大央行警告说，持续的关税争端已经 "激怒了市场"，并增加了 "无序 "抛售的风险，这将考验该国的金融体系。【原文：The Bank of Canada is warning that the ongoing tariff dispute has “rattled markets” and increases the risk of “disorderly” selloffs that would test the country’s financial system.】

item.title: Whoop 推出具有血压和心电图功能的超薄健身手环
item.description:
评论：Whoop 5.0和MG — 医疗级的缩写— 旨在吸引更广泛的用户群，而不仅仅是运动员。【原文：

Review: The Whoop 5.0 and MG — short for medical grade — are meant to appeal to a broad user base beyond just athletes.

item.title: 特朗普吹捧与英国的贸易协定，美国股市上涨
item.description: 美国股市周四开盘攀升，投资者对美国和英国之间达成贸易协定的消息表示欢迎；一些交易商称，这一广受期待的进展可能成为更广泛的全球谈判的蓝图。【原文：US stocks climbed at the open Thursday as investors welcomed news of a trade agreement between the US and the UK — a widely anticipated development that some traders say could serve as a blueprint for broader global negotiations.】

item.title: 加拿大将在七国集团内首次建造小型模块化核反应堆
item.description: 加拿大省政府批准了建造一种新型、小型核电站的计划，为这一新兴产业注入了一剂强心针。【原文：Canada’s provincial government approved plans to build a new, smaller kind of nuclear power plant, providing a significant shot in the arm for the nascent industry.】

item.description:

item.title: Coinbase 以 29 亿美元收购加密货币期权交易所 Deribit
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc. 表示，它将以 29 亿美元的价格收购全球最大的比特币和以太币期权交易所 Deribit，这家美国最大的加密货币交易所将进军衍生品市场。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. said it is acquiring Deribit, the world’s largest exchange for Bitcoin and Ether options, for $2.9 billion as the biggest US crypto exchange makes a push into the derivatives market.】

item.title: 美国和英国将发布贸易公告
item.description: 英国费利克斯托港的集装箱船。摄影师：Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg【原文：Container ships at the Port of Felixstowe in Felixstowe, UK. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数在春季休会期间短暂飙升后出现下降
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数在经历了春季休会和 4 月底复活节假期的短期飙升后，上周有所下降。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits fell last week after a short-term spike coinciding with spring recess and the Easter holiday at the end of April.】

item.title: 产出下降，美国生产力自 2022 年以来首次下降
item.description: 随着经济产出的下降，美国第一季度的劳动生产率出现了近三年来的首次下降，从而结束了有助于缓和就业成本对通胀影响的连续增效。【原文：US labor productivity fell in the first quarter for the first time in nearly three years as economic output declined, snapping a streak of efficiency gains that have helped temper the inflationary impact from employment costs.】

item.title: 智利年度通胀放缓，政策制定者警惕物价上涨压力
item.description: 智利上个月的年度通胀率降幅超过预期，原因是决策者对近期的消费价格压力和更加动荡的全球经济前景保持警惕。【原文：Chile’s annual inflation eased more than expected last month as policymakers kept their guard up against both near-term consumer price pressures and a more turbulent global economic outlook.】

item.title: 暂停 IPO之际，LG 电子斥资 6 亿美元在印度建厂
item.description: LG 电子印度有限公司将在印度建立第三家工厂，这标志着该公司在印度这个第五大经济体的发展计划，尽管该公司推迟了在印度上市的计划，其上市融资额超过 10 亿美元。【原文：LG Electronics India Ltd. will build its third plant in India, signaling its growth plans in the fifth-largest economy despite deferring its $1 billion-plus public listing in the county.】

item.title: 墨西哥在议息会议前通胀加速超预期
item.description: 墨西哥 4 月份通胀加速超过预期，但仍保持在央行的目标范围内，这可能使下周降息半个百分点成为可能。【原文：Mexico’s inflation accelerated more than expected in April while remaining within the central bank’s target range, likely keeping a half-point interest rate cut next week on the table.】

item.title: 外国投资者重新关注南非股票
item.description: 南非股票市场两年多来最长的连续资金流入表明，随着投资者寻找美股之外的其他投资选择，外国需求正在回升。【原文：The longest streak of inflows into South Africa’s equity market in more than two years signals a pickup in foreign demand as investors look for alternatives to US stocks.】

item.title: 尼日利亚偿还国际货币基金组织 34 亿美元科维德贷款，退出债务名单
item.description: 尼日利亚已偿还了在 "科维德-19 "大流行期间向国际货币基金组织借贷的 34 亿美元，从而退出了欠这家总部设在华盛顿的贷款机构债务的国家名单。【原文：Nigeria has paid off $3.4 billion borrowed from the International Monetary Fund during the Covid-19 pandemic, exiting the list of countries that are in debt to the Washington-based lender.】

item.title: 如果特朗普不达成协议，欧盟将瞄准美国汽车、飞机和波旁酒
item.description: 如果与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普团队正在进行的贸易谈判未能取得令人满意的结果，欧盟计划对950亿欧元（1080亿美元）的美国出口商品征收额外关税。【原文：The European Union is planning to hit €95 billion ($108 billion) of US exports with additional tariffs if ongoing trade talks with President Donald Trump’s team fail to yield a satisfactory result.】

item.title: 华尔街经纪商可能因美国证券交易委员会的转变而损失数十亿美元的费用
item.description: 潜在的有利于 ETF 行业的监管转变预计将动摇华尔街经纪商的业务模式，这关系到数十亿美元的收入。【原文：A potential regulatory shift in favor of the ETF industry is expected to shake up the business models of Wall Street brokers, with billions of dollars in revenue at stake.】

item.title: 数周打击后，数十名水手仍被困在也门附近海域
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周宣布美国将停止轰炸也门胡塞叛军，这对被困也门海岸数周的数十名海员来说本应是个好消息。但现实却不那么确定。【原文：President Donald Trump’s announcement this week that the US would stop bombing Yemen’s Houthi rebels should have been good news for the dozens of seafarers who’ve been stuck off the country’s coast for weeks. But the reality is much less certain.】

item.title: 软银、Tether、Cantor 在加密货币博弈中注入金融力量
item.description: 2020 年，当迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）将他那家濒临倒闭的软件公司转变为比特币巨头时，他利用资本市场的巨大能量，完成了近期记忆中最成功的企业转型之一。【原文：When Michael Saylor transformed his long-fading software firm into a Bitcoin juggernaut in 2020, he pulled off one of the most successful corporate pivots in recent memory by weaponizing the sheer power of capital markets.】

item.title: 从苹果到通用，关税将使企业损失数百亿美元
item.description: 从苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：From Apple Inc. to General Motors Co., corporate America is bracing for tens of billions of dollars in damages from Trump’s trade war — and that’s before most affected goods have landed.】

item.title: 乌克兰议会批准与美国的自然资源协议
item.description: 乌克兰议会批准了与美国达成的一项关于获取该国自然资源的协议，全力支持沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基总统试图改善与唐纳德-特朗普的关系。【原文：Ukraine’s parliament ratified a deal with the US over access to the country’s natural resources, lending its full support to attempts by President Volodymyr Zelenskiy to improve ties with Donald Trump.】

item.title: 康菲石油公司在油价下跌之际下调支出预测
item.description: 康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）成为今年原油价格跌破每桶 60 美元后最新一家削减支出的美国石油勘探公司。【原文：ConocoPhillips became the latest US oil explorer to cut spending after a drop in crude prices below $60 a barrel this year.】

item.title: Match 集团裁员 13% 以扭转颓势的最新举措
item.description: 作为裁员 13% 的一部分，Match Group Inc. 将裁减五分之一的管理人员，这是该公司新任首席执行官为扭转这家约会应用公司的局面所做的最新努力。【原文：Match Group Inc. is cutting one in five managers as part of a 13% workforce reduction, the latest effort by its new chief executive officer to deliver a turnaround at the dating app company.】

item.title: 为什么页岩油峰值预测可能为时过早？
item.description:
如果要从过去二十年中汲取教训，那就是任何人都不应该抹杀美国在岸业务的增长前景。【原文：

If there’s a lesson to be learned from the past two decades, it’s that no one should write off the growth prospects of the US onshore business.

】

item.title: BCE 削减 56% 股息，与 PSP 达成光纤网络协议
item.description: BCE 公司在分析师和投资者数月要求其改善资产负债表的压力下，17 年来首次削减了股息。【原文：BCE Inc. cut its dividend for the first time in 17 years following months of pressure from analysts and investors to improve its balance sheet.】

item.title: Peloton 销售额再次下滑后下跌
item.description: Peloton Interactive 公司公布上一季度营收下降 13%，销售额连续第三年同比下降，股价在盘前交易中下跌。【原文：Peloton Interactive Inc. shares dropped in premarket trading after reporting that revenue sank 13% last quarter, marking the third straight year-on-year decline in sales.】

item.title: 贸易战影响下，Shopify 业绩下滑，前景仅符合预期
item.description: Shopify 公司股价下跌，此前该公司预计本季度销售额仅达到预期，这表明对来自中国的商品征收高额关税将拖累公司未来的增长。【原文：Shopify Inc. shares fell after the company projected sales in the current quarter that just met expectations, suggesting steep tariffs on goods from China will weigh on growth going forward.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦称 5 月份不打算削减石油产量
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦能源部表示，哈萨克斯坦因持续突破产量限制而在欧佩克+内部制造了紧张局势，但该国没有计划在 5 月份削减石油产量。【原文：Kazakhstan, which has created tensions within OPEC+ by consistently breaching its production limit, has no plans to cut oil output in May, the country’s Energy Ministry said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯七月马铃薯丰收，进口推动价格下降
item.description: 俄罗斯农业部长表示，由于早期作物的收获和进口，俄罗斯的马铃薯价格应从 7 月份开始从历史最高点回落。【原文：Potato prices in Russia should begin to decline from record highs starting in July owing to the harvesting of early crops and imports, the agriculture minister said.】
